entry.title: $2575 // *HUGE, SUNNY 1 BR, CLSTS, LAUNDRY, ELEVATOR* W low 100's/Manhattan Ave
entry.content:
This is a huge, sunny 1 bedroom apt in a luxury, prewar, elevator building. There is also a laundry room. Pets are welcome. This renovated 1br apt has a huge living room/dining area, large, king size bedroom, high ceilings, several windows and closets, large entrance foyer, new large bath, new kitchen with stainless steel appliances and city views. Heat and water are included. A must see!
Fabulous location! Just steps to Central Park, all shopping, restaurants and cafes! Lots of great neighbors. Only one block to the B, C Trains. Available August 15th. Please email Ruth to schedule an appointment.

That's right, NO BROKER'S FOR THIS MANSION!!!

3 huge floor to ceiling closets, extraordinarily high ceilings! Unit includes heat, hot water, and cooking gas! A REAL MUST SEE!!! Traditional wood parquet floors, windowed full bath with prewar 5ft tub, 24hour doorman, credit card operated laundry room accessible 24hours, 2 brand new elevators, extremely well maintained building, owner managed on site, we are looking for tenant with AAA references!!!
This will rent quickly!
ABSOLUTELY NO FEE!!!
Must have 100K combined provable income, and/or guarantor, please be properly documented.
Call or text Roger's mobile# to view (212) 222-9999, once again first come first served , fair game!! Pets welcome, after all, Riverside Park is your backyard!!! Approximately 700sqft of fine living space!
No nonsense, onsite owners, approval in a day or 2 max!!!!!
Really, best deal on the UWS for huge apt, 24hour doorman, spacious lobby with leather couches, package room, there's even a phone in the lobby so you can reach the building anytime!!!
I'm a Broker on the UWS for since 1989, sure won't waste your time, you get exactly what is advertised!
Upgrade to others $2800 larger, $3100 phenomenal 3.5 classic!!! ALL NO FEE!!!
Happy apt hunting!!!!!!!!!!
Please text/call Roger (212) 222-9999. Ready for occupancy.

Conveniently located near the 1 subway line, and a short walk to the A, C, B, and D trains at Columbus Circle. Right down the street from Central Park West, Fordham, Lincoln Center, and Julliard.

entry.title: $2500 // Charming Apartment In Townhouse Close To Riverside Park
entry.content:
A fully furnished studio apartment maintains an air of authenticity on parlor floor of charming pre-war town house. Spacious, bright and airy living area features dramatic triple windows with a partial view of Riverside Park which is just steps away for park enthusiasts. One of the building's original fireplaces from the 1800's creates a beautiful focal point to the living room, however due to New York City fire regulations, it cannot be used. This studio sleeps three comfortably, with a queen-size bed with sleek steel headboard and frame, as well as a sofa bed that opens to another full-size bed.
Address 316 W 75th St New York, NY 10023
